A version of '''[[Indev 0.31]]''' was released on '''January 29, 2010''', at 21:34 UTC<ref>{{Cite IRC logs|Adura|tz=standard|file=2010-01-29_#minecraft.log|"16:34:33 <Notch> vede: Now?"..."16:35:54 <Notch> Peerko: Reload the page now"}}</ref>, for attempting to fix "Unable to validate certificate chain" bug from previous version.<ref>{{Cite IRC logs|Adura|tz=standard|file=2010-01-29_#minecraft.log|"16:30:12 <vede> Fatal error (5)"..."16:30:35 <vede> Unable to validate certificate chain."..."16:30:45 <Notch> uh, sorry about that. ;D"}}</ref>

This version therefore has no changes at all.

== Fixes ==
* Attempted to fix "Unable to validate certificate chain" bug, but it was not succesful.<ref>{{Cite IRC logs|Adura|tz=standard|file=2010-01-29_#minecraft.log|"16:35:54 <vede> Same."..."16:37:10 <Peerko> "Unable to validate certificate chain. Native entry did not have a certificate at all"}}</ref>
